name: Nerts (itch)
description:
A description of how to play nerts here:https://bicyclecards.com/how-to-play/nerts/

If you're not looking to read that, just keep in mind that this game is basically multiplayer solitaire!

Note: This game uses the free version of Photon Unity Network (PUN), and so is limited at 20 CCU (concurrent users) at the moment.
